DOC.brief_summary: Employees develop society become increasingly sedentary work home due technological advance . Physical inactivity couple excess intake calorie-rich food responsible epidemic obesity . In population cohort , physical inactivity obesity increase risk cardiovascular disease death . Because impact productivity health care cost , many business organization initiate `` wellness '' program , often facility work site encourage exercise . Although program often result improved fitness participant , weight loss difficult achieve . In regard , initial study NIH employee participate NHLBI 's Keep Beat program -- two-thirds overweight obese -- find improved exercise fitness 3 month participation , exercise average 20 minute work day , significant weight loss . Associated great fitness participant improvement endothelial function , important biomarker cardiovascular risk . Because level fitness strong predictor cardiovascular ( total ) mortality population study , investigator think leader propose acceptable `` fat fit . '' We find study , however , exercise alone little effect insulin sensitivity biomarkers risk , include C-reactive protein , could limit improvement endothelial function even great risk reduction . We propose test protocol whether weight loss supervise nutritional counseling daily exercise worksite facility confer health benefit beyond achieve improved fitness alone , improvement endothelial function , arterial compliance , insulin sensitivity , marker inflammation blood high-density lipoprotein ( HDL ) structure function . Because obesity sedentary workforce environment especially prevalent among woman , additional contribution menopause obesity , study restrict overweight obese woman allow appropriate analysis cohort manageable size test resource . The primary endpoint differential improvement endothelial function , determine brachial artery reactivity shear stress , baseline 6 month participant randomize exercise couple weight-loss intervention versus subject randomize exercise alone . Secondary analysis include comparison adiposity , arterial stiffness , insulin sensitivity , HDL subparticles function , marker inflammation adipokines blood , exploratory analysis minority age/hormonal interaction . Demonstration improve vascular function biomarkers cardiovascular risk improve fitness combine weight loss may serve incentive great participation organization-initiated wellness program emphasis exercise personalize nutritional counseling .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Worksite Wellness Interventions Vascular Function , Insulin Sensitivity High-Density Lipoprotein Overweight Obese Women
DOC.detailed_description: Employees develop society become increasingly sedentary work home due technological advance . Physical inactivity couple excess intake calorie-rich food responsible epidemic obesity . In population cohort , physical inactivity obesity increase risk cardiovascular disease death . Because impact productivity health care cost , many business organization initiate `` wellness '' program , often facility work site encourage exercise . Although program often result improved fitness participant , weight loss difficult achieve . In regard , initial study NIH employee participate NHLBI 's Keep Beat program -- two-thirds overweight obese -- find improved exercise fitness 3 month participation , exercise average 20 minute work day , significant weight loss . Associated great fitness participant improvement endothelial function , important biomarker cardiovascular risk . Because level fitness strong predictor cardiovascular ( total ) mortality population study , investigator think leader propose acceptable `` fat fit . '' We find study , however , exercise alone little effect insulin sensitivity biomarkers risk , include C-reactive protein , could limit improvement endothelial function even great risk reduction . We propose test protocol whether weight loss supervise nutritional counseling daily exercise worksite facility confer health benefit beyond achieve improved fitness alone , improvement endothelial function , arterial compliance , insulin sensitivity , marker inflammation blood high-density lipoprotein ( HDL ) structure function . Because obesity sedentary workforce environment especially prevalent among woman , additional contribution menopause obesity , study restrict overweight obese woman allow appropriate analysis cohort manageable size test resource . The primary endpoint differential improvement endothelial function , determine brachial artery reactivity shear stress , baseline 6 month participant randomize exercise couple weight-loss intervention versus subject randomize exercise alone . Secondary analysis include comparison adiposity , arterial stiffness , insulin sensitivity , HDL subparticles function , marker inflammation adipokines blood , exploratory analysis minority age/hormonal interaction . Demonstration improve vascular function biomarkers cardiovascular risk improve fitness combine weight loss may serve incentive great participation organization-initiated wellness program emphasis exercise personalize nutritional counseling .
DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA : 1 . Female employee NIH currently participate great 3 month participation Keep Beat program structure exercise weightloss program ( e.g. , Weight Watchers , NutriSystems , personalize nutritional counseling fitness trainer ) , undergone weight loss ( bariatric ) surgery . Selfdirected exercise ( walk around block , climb stair ) acceptable inclusion , subject encourage continue activity , addition worksite exercise , throughout program . 2 . Bodymass index great equal 25 kg/m ( 2 ) . 3 . Subject understands protocol provide write , informed consent addition willingness comply specify followup evaluation . EXCLUSION CRITERIA : 1 . Medical condition , include recent unintentional weight loss , might prohibit safe participation Keep Beat program . 2 . Fluctuation weight great 5 percent previous 3 month self report . 3 . Fasting blood glucose great equal 126 mg/dL absence prior diagnosis diabetes mellitus . 4 . Weight great 200 kg ( exceeds capacity DXA scanner ) . 5 . Heart disease indicate history myocardial infarction , document disease coronary angiography , coronary artery stent placement , congestive heart failure , significant structural heart disease ( e.g . hypertrophic dilate cardiomyopathy , valvular heart disease ) . 6 . Hyper hypothyroid routine lab screening . 7 . Physically unable perform Keep Beat program due neurologic orthopedic condition . 8 . Pregnant woman due large hormonal change pregnancy affect study variables potential pregnancyrelated restriction exercise . 9 . Participation another study protocol include blood draw intervention . 10 . Use medication might interfere , promote , weight loss .
